unnormalised: Regarding your query about ticket cancellation, please note that the PNR number is mandatory for initiating the process. Also, provide your booking ID, IRCTC user ID if applicable and ticket number to verify the booking details. Please also note that for flights, airlines may require the confirmation number and frequent flyer number if used.
normalised: Regarding your query about ticket cancellation, please note that the P-N-R number is mandatory for initiating the process. Also, provide your booking I-D, I-R-C-T-C user I-D if applicable and ticket number to verify the booking details. Please also note that for flights, airlines may require the confirmation number and frequent flyer number if used.
